title: Showdown ahead? Donald Trump tests Congress on checks and balances
shortDescription: Some GOP senators say they are prepared to fight for their role to advise and consent on Cabinet picks.

title: Latino voters fired Democrats in 2024. Now they're election 'free agents'
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump won the Rio Grande Valley, a Latino-majority area along the border in south Texas.

title: Trump taps Florida sheriff to head DEA and oversee US fentanyl fight
shortDescription: Hillsborough County Sheriff Chad Chronister will be a key player in Trump's effort to 'secure the Border, stop the flow of Fentanyl,' Trump says

title: Trump vows 100% tariff on BRIC nations if they ditch US dollar support
shortDescription: The president-elect's threat comes just days after he threatened big tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China. Experts warn of higher prices.

title: Trump taps loyal supporter Kash Patel to run FBI
shortDescription: Patel, a former DOJ lawyer and Hill staffer, served in top roles at end of Trump's first term. Lately he's vowed to go after 'deep state' bureaucrats

title: Trump chooses Charles Kushner as US Ambassador to France
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump announced in a Truth Social post on Saturday that he’s choosing Charles Kushner as US Ambassador to France.

title: Jeffries condemns Thanksgiving Day threats against House Democrats
shortDescription: House Minority Leader Rep. Hakeem Jeffries, D-N.Y., condemned Thanksgiving Day threats against Democratic lawmakers.

title: Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy to meet with House Republicans
shortDescription: Businessmen Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy will meet with House Republicans this week to discuss cuts to federal government spending, among other matters.

title: Trump gained working-class voters in this deep blue stronghold
shortDescription: Massachusetts experienced one of the most profound rightward shifts of any state in the country, largely driven by working-class communities.

title: Trump meets Canadian leader Justin Trudeau to talk tariffs
shortDescription: The unannounced meeting comes days after President-elect pledged to enact crippling tariffs on Canada and Mexico over illegal immigration and drugs.

title: Assisted suicide bill advances in England after passionate debate
shortDescription: The law, whose passage isn't a sure thing, would legalize "assisted dying" in England and Wales for patients with six months or less to live.

title: What to know about the spending fight ahead in Congress
shortDescription: Lawmakers have until Dec. 20 to pass a government funding extension and avoid a shutdown.

title: No, Musk didn't say Trump will 'do anything' he says | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence Musk ever posted the statement attributed to him about his supposed influence on Trump.

title: Anti-abortion leaders look at way forward with Trump, pro-choice RFK
shortDescription: Though Trump has touted his role in helping overturn Roe v. Wade, there were tensions between him and the anti-abortion movement over a national abortion ban.

title: 'Unfinished business': The White House aides coming back for Trump 2.0
shortDescription: Donald Trump has rapidly assembled his next White House team, with several veterans from his first term planning to move aggressively on Day One.

title: Connecticut House Democrats receive Thanksgiving Day bomb threats
shortDescription: Multiple House Democrats from Connecticut including the chairman of the House Intelligence Committee were targets of Thanksgiving Day bomb threats Thursday.

title: Does Congress have to authorize tariffs? What to know
shortDescription: Congress usually sets tariffs, but President-elect Donald Trump could declare a national emergency, as he's done in the past.

title: Trump talks about 'effectively closing' the border with Mexican president
shortDescription: Mexico's president spoke with President-elect Donald Trump after he threatened to impose tariffs in an effort to crack down on illegal immigration.

title: Trump cabinet picks receive bomb threats
shortDescription: Several members of President-elect Donald Trump's nominated cabinet members have been targeted with bomb threats, according to the FBI.

title: Trump AG pick didn't post about probing Pelosi finances | Fact check
shortDescription: There's no record of the post on Bondi's X profile. The post was shared by a satirical X account whose "parody" label is omitted in the image.

title: Desinformaciones impulsadas por nominados a gabinete de Trump | Hechos
shortDescription: Otros de los nominados por Trump han mostrado escepticismo respecto a temas de cambio climático que ya tienen consenso científico.

title: No, Trump didn't name Hulk Hogan as education secretary | Fact check
shortDescription: There was no evidence to support the claim, which was made by a comedian, when it was made. Trump later picked an Oregon lawmaker for the job.
